snippet: Members of the European Parliament’s foreign affairs committee set off a firestorm of criticism in Iran after they greeted officials in what was deemed inappropriate attire.
abstract: Conservative Iranians express outrage at European Parliament foreign affairs committee delegates, who arrive in Tehran for meeting with Iranian Parliament leader Ali Larijani wearing clothing that they say is mockery to Islamic law.
lead_paragraph: Members of the European Parliament’s foreign affairs committee set off a firestorm of criticism in Iran after they greeted officials in what was deemed inappropriate attire.

headline.main: With Backpacks and Exposed Skin, European Officials Roil Iranians
headline.print_headline: E.U. Officials Rile Iranians With Wardrobe Decisions
